photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile photo.

admin.description: Whether the user has admin privileges.

Content.title: Content
Content.description: Represents a movie, web series, or drama.

tmdbId.description: The Movie Database (TMDB) ID for sourcing video from VidLink.

description.description: A short description of the content.

bannerImageUrl.description: URL for the banner image used in carousels and grids.

posterImageUrl.description: URL for the high-resolution poster image used in hero sections and the video player.

categories.description: A list of categories or tags for the content.

isFeatured.description: If true, this content will be featured in the hero banner on the homepage.

embedUrl.description: Optional direct embed URL or iframe code. This will be used instead of TMDB if provided.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the content was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the content was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public information about a user.

/content/{contentId}.description: Stores all content items like movies, web series, and dramas.
